message.content:
I need to identify and extract the value of income arising from the entity's core operating activities.

Looking at the income statement, the core operating activities would be reflected in the "Main Business Revenue" which shows the primary income from the company's operations before any expenses.

In the given problem, I can see:
- Main Business Revenue: 5064939.23 (dated 2024-01-29)
- This same amount is also listed as Total Revenue

The main business revenue represents the income from core operating activities, so the value I need to extract is 5064939.23.

```json
{"solution": {'value': '5064939.23'} }
```
